EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Pivotal Analytics Day_KC_Q317.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Analytics Day Kansas City | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Analytics Day in Kansas City on September 21st.
As a reminder the morning sessions are for business and data professionals who want to better understand how to evolve their data and analytics capabilities to meet their business strategies and objectives. We will also be hosting a hands-on training for technical practitioners in the afternoon. Due to technical requirements, this session is limited to the first 20 registrants.
Please bring your laptop for the hands-on workshop. Windows students will need an SSH program installed such as MobaXterm. MacOS students can use the standard terminal application.
Date: Thursday, September 21, 2017
Time:
8:00AM to 5:30PM
Location: Sprint Accelerator 210 W 19th Terrace Kansas City, MO 64108 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Sprint+Accelerator/@39.090327,-94.586784,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x7c60e2cd8c8f5ac3!8m2!3d39.090327!4d-94.586784]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please contact me at aewy@pivotal.io <[[mailto:aewy@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there! Alex Ewy and The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Pivotal-Analytics-Day-Kansas-City.html]]>
